version_description: bug fixed (the desks of the restaurant and teachers were not displayed)

Added Zombies mode
(You can choose no zombies mode)

Added school bag
Added shadow option
Added auto tracking camera

Added maid cafe in front of the main gate (You can work in cafe)
Added new hair style,long skirt, maid hair band
Added Jeep (you can drive with lover)

Added
- ski/surf board
- fish in the sea , weather
- new players, new hats
- outline on/off in setup

- library
- ribbon
- change the uniform of all students in setup (summer , winter and blazer)
- Gyaru face skin (can be changed with eye color button)

- change the boy / girl uniform of all students
- cars in town ( change number in setup)
- holiday

- cherry trees
- shrine & shrine maiden
- long hair
- soccer ball dribble & shoot

-X'mas tree & snowman
-hats & nekoMimi Store
-new hair styles & scarf
-blazer new 3 color

Added scarf & teddy bear in store
Added no glow ,heart mark eyes
Added very long skirt sailor costume girl student

long twin tail hair
new 2 hair colors
white collar black winter sailor costume
pink summer sailor costume

Valentine's Chocolate (4 in the game)
Can put things in the student desk and hand it over
backpack
new 4 dresses for Girl 2

-red blazer uniform for the student council
-fountain

-Many students go to school from home.
-You can enter the house and get foods and gold coins.
-playground ( swing ,slider, etc)

- new hair style
- new camera pose

Toys claw machines
photo booth(can take a selfie)

- can shoot basketball in the gym.
- fox ear.

- hair dressing table in my room
- cooking with my kitchen
- clean time (after 6th class)
- baseball ground
- UI on/off in SETUP

- burger shop you can work part-time.
- Naoko player 2 colors costumes.
- green lens sunglasses.
- hit the pitcher's ball at the baseball field

- Sadoh (Tea Lessons) event
- school students visit a shrine.
- can eat burger made by myself
- Witch's hat

- card game 'President' ( card on the desk at player's room)
- Fly / Jump mode in Setup
- add Aki hair
- reduced lag , app launch time

- fox tail (next to the bag in player room)
- new talk window
- Janken(Rock - Paper - Scissors)
- new hair style & hat

- Hair salon
- Clothes store
- new costume

- bad boy rides a motorbike
- crown , new bag

-bad girl rides Vespa.
-new hair styles, sun hat
-shop props

- new hair styles
- new hats
- bugs fix

- people take a bus to the sea on holiday and after school
- Students can have two items
- When the player sits at the cafe, the followers also sit
- followers also take a bus
- screen orientation landscape left / right

- Hair color can be change to any color ( edit in top menu).
- Skiing event after school and on holiday.
- Added the dog.
- "Follow me" is possible for animals.
- when you throw thing, the follower animal will bring it to you.

-Fire works
-When the player sits down, following NPC sits on the furniture store chair.
-New hair style
- the cafe with a buffet style(next to the hair salon)

-new hairstyles
-new head dresser & red ribbon
-new 2 students

-new hair styles
-wing, horn
-bug fix

- can put 5 items into a bag (simple inventory)

- water slides
- street cap, kankan hat
- usamimi, horn, muffler
- animal ear button

-can draw on the blackboard and the glass of the burger shop
-new boy hair style & new girl 2 hair styles

-new hair styles
-wing, horn

punk jacket
maiden dress
miko(shrine maiden)
lolita dress
